If the Anunnaki’s Phoenix Matrix Master Plan succeeded, the Halls of Amenti Star Gates would create an open Wormhole interface into other living Time Matrices, and the life-forms of Earth would become entrapped in deteriorating thought-form bodies that would become the “ slave demon force” of the Fallen Angelic collectives. This was the intention of the Luciferian Anunnaki when they devised the “Atlantian Flood Drama”; this is the Destiny of Sorrow to which they have long desired to condemn our race . Joining the Fallen Angelics in their finite Phantom Matrix “holographic prison” is the false ''eternal life'' they have been deviously promising Human and Illuminati-Leviathan races since the fall of Atlantis. Real eternal life is achieved through genuine Ascension and Mastery of Consciousness within the living Time Matrix. Phantom Matrix ''life-forms'' are not truly “alive” in biological or spiritual terms; they are, in truth, ''living dead'' races, finite consciousness thought-form identities trapped within a progressively fragmenting and deteriorating Sub-time Universe, who can take 395
